header.name: Shafqat Nadeem
header.title: Senior Flutter Engineer | Mobile, Android, iOS & Web Development | 6+ Years | 30+ Apps Deployed

about.title: Professional Summary
about.paragraph:
Senior Flutter Engineer with 6+ years of expertise in Flutter, Dart, Android, iOS, and Web development. Proficient in Firebase, AWS, GCP, S3, CloudFront, Cloud Functions, REST APIs, and GraphQL APIs. Solid knowledge of Python, Node.js, MySQL, and ELK Stack (Elasticsearch). Familiar with Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and Selenium.

Developed over 30 mobile applications, helping businesses and startups scale successfully. Strong background in CI/CD, CodeMagic, Agile development, and DevOps practices.

Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from University of Sargodha, Lahore Campus (2015-2019).

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.pitch: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out. I'll try my best to get back to you! Let's collaborate on innovative AI-powered mobile applications and cutting-edge Flutter solutions.

info.title: Let's Connect
info.description: Feel free to reach out through any of these platforms. I'm always open to discussing new projects and opportunities.

hire.title: Let's Build Something Amazing Together
hire.subtitle: Transform Your Vision Into Reality
hire.pitch: Ready to elevate your mobile application to the next level? With 6+ years of expertise and 30+ successful deployments, I specialize in crafting pixel-perfect, scalable solutions that users love and businesses trust.

development.title: Full-Stack Development
development.description: From concept to deployment, I build robust Flutter applications for iOS, Android, and Web with clean architecture and best practices.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.description: Get expert guidance on app architecture, technology stack selection, and optimization strategies to ensure your project's success.

optimization.title: Performance Optimization
optimization.description: Transform your existing app with performance enhancements, code refactoring, and pixel-perfect UI implementations.

starter.title: Starter Package
starter.description: Perfect for MVPs and new projects. Get started with competitive rates and scale as you grow.

ongoing.title: Ongoing Projects
ongoing.description: Long-term partnerships with dedicated support and continuous delivery.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Solutions
enterprise.description: Custom pricing for large-scale projects requiring dedicated resources and architecture expertise.

common.whatsappMessage: Hi Shafqat! I came across your portfolio and would like to discuss a project opportunity with you.
